input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
925 Sterling Silver Open Celtic Around Oval Blue Stone Pendant Necklace 18"- Nickel Free

Product keywords:
Pendant Size: 1.4x 2.8cm. Silver Chain Length: 18''
Weight: 2.4 g.
High quality .925 sterling silver
Natural Blue Topaz Stone
Packaging: Black Velvet Pouch
Matching earrings available. Search Amazon by KEA0007SIL

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This beautiful 925 sterling silver open celtic around oval blue stone pendant necklace is a gorgeous and elegant accessory that will add a touch of class and style to any outfit. The pendant is made from high quality.925 sterling silver and features a natural blue topaz stone, which gives it a stunning and unique appearance. The pendant hangs from a silver chain that is 18 inches in length, which makes it an ideal length for most women. This pendant necklace is nickle free, and comes in a black velvet pouch, which makes it an ideal gift for any occasion. Matching earrings are also available, so you can coordinate your look.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
